255 private:
256  friend class ModuleLoader;
257  template<class T>
258  struct UnrefCompare : public std::binary_function<T, T, bool>
259  {
260  bool operator()(T x, T y) const
261  {
262  return *x < *y;
263  }
264  };
265 
266  typedef std::map<const ObjectType*, ObjectType, UnrefCompare<const ObjectType*> > SpecificationMap;
267 
268  typedef std::map<const ObjectTypeTemplate*, std::function<ObjectType(const ObjectType&)>, UnrefCompare<const ObjectTypeTemplate*> > ExtensionMap;
